definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: dwell (prob.; √ of foll.; Ar. 9a0na is support, help, v. esp. Fl:Kl. Schr. i. 87 ff.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. consec. [[וְעָנׇה֫]] (rd. [[וְעָ֫נׇה]] ?) Is 13:22 and jackals shall dwell, etc. (on agreement v. Ges:§ 145 k; ‖[[שׁכן]] v:Is 13:21), so LXX Buhl; Che:Heb. Hpt. 124 [[וְשָֽׁכְנוּ]]; > SyrVer Targum Vulgate al. √ IV. [[ענה]].—Ps 87:7 v. [[מַעְיׇן]]. p. 777
